name: Don't look weird
description:
You're on a train, going to the place you need to be. You're on your phone, lazily browsing whatever site will distract you long enough to get to the next station. Then, disaster strikes. Your phone dies. You quietly panic, cursing yourself for forgetting to charge your phone more. What do you do now? Simple.

Don't look weird.

It'll be easy, right? Riiiiiight?

(Music by the very talented magicdweedoo)
